pedRecMessage: We have sent an email with the password recovery instructions.
pwdRecInst: Enter the following address and change your new password
newPasswordSuccessfully: The password was change successfully, go to login page
tokenSent: The token has been sent to the email, and will be valid for the next 5 minutes.
tokenTime: This token is valid for only 5 minutes.
textAuthblk: Are you sure you want to validate the block? This action can not be undone
textAuthtrans: Are you sure you want to validate the transaction? This action can not be undone
cancelAuth:
Are you sure you want to not authorize the activity?
The entire operation will be cancelled.
This action cannot be undone.
tokenLength: The token must be exactly 6 characters
confAuth:
Are you sure you want to authorize the activity?
This action cannot be undone.
confNoauth:
Are you sure you want to cancel the activity?
This action cannot be undone.
authSuccessfully: The authorization was carried out successfully
tokenFor: Here is the token for the operation with ID
forenameMin: The forename field must be at least 3 characters in length
forenameMax: The forename field cannot exceed 30 characters in length
surnameMin: The surname field must be at least 3 characters in length
surnameMax: The surname field cannot exceed 30 characters in length
newUserMail:
Buen día,

El usuario [user] con cuenta de correo [email] fue dado de alta en la Plataforma de Registro del Sistema de Comercio de Emisiones de la SEMARNAT.

Usted fue dado de alta como un usuario de la empresa [company].

Para acceder a la plataforma, usted puede seguir los siguientes pasos:

  • Dar click en la siguiente liga: [url]
  • En el Menú, dar click en 'login' y dar click en [¿Se te olvidó tu contraseña?] para dar de alta tu contraseña y poder utilizar la plataforma.
El Manual del Usuario de la Plataforma de Registro del Sistema de Comercio de Emisiones está disponible en: [url]/manuals/manual.pdf

Saludos cordiales

[logo]

[adminName]
emailMin: The email field must be at least 6 characters in length
emailMax: The email field cannot exceed 50 characters in length
emailValid: The email field must contain a valid email address
pwdMin: The password field must be at least 8 characters in length
pwdMax: The password field cannot exceed 255 characters in length
